description: Schema for submitting information about ontology.
title: Ontology

___download_url.description: URL to download the full ontology.
___download_url.title: Download URL

___ontology_prefix.comment: An identifying property that can be used for retrieval
___ontology_prefix.title: Ontology Prefix
___ontology_prefix.descripton: Abbreviation for the ontology - should correspond to the valid prefix for the ontology eg. EFO, OBI, UBERON and be unique

___description.description: A short description of the ontology.
___description.title: Description

___synonym_terms.decription: Terms that are used to denote synonyms - eg. 'exact synonym', 'alternative term' ...
___synonym_terms.title: Synonym Terms

___namespace_url.internal_comment: may not be the same as home url - this to get specific terms or to use as namespace when parsing rdf
___namespace_url.description: The base URL to which a term identifier can be added to construct a url to a term.
___namespace_url.title: Namespace URL

___ontology_url.internal_comment: may not be the same url used to generate term specific url - see base_url
___ontology_url.description: An external link to information about the ontology.
___ontology_url.title: Ontology URL

___definition_terms.decription: Terms that are used to denote definitions - eg. 'definition', 'IAO:00000115' ...
___definition_terms.title: Definition Terms

___ontology_versions.description: List of all deployed versions of ontology
___ontology_versions.title: Version History

___relation_terms.decription: Terms that are used to denote relationships often found in onProperty triple - eg. 'part of', 'develops from' ...
___relation_terms.internal_comment: Will only store a subset of relationships - those of interest when parsing ontologies
___relation_terms.title: Relationship Terms
